title: Most dangerous AFC wild card team? Are Cowboys legit? Joe Burrow = Macaulay Culkin; HOF Aeneas Williams
itunes:title: Most dangerous AFC wild card team? Are Cowboys legit? Joe Burrow = Macaulay Culkin; HOF Aeneas Williams
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt and Super Bowl Champion, Mike Robinson explore which wild card team in the AFC (Chargers, Patriots, Dolphins, Colts) is the most dangerous. Then Peter leads "we in or we out" and the crew debates if Mike Vrabel or somebody else should be the coach of the year, and how similar Joe Burrow looks to Macaulay Culkin. Also, they're joined by Scott Pioli and he shares his thoughts on the legitimacy of the Dallas Cowboys and how a team decides if they have their quarterback of the future and lastly, they're joined by Hall of Famer, Aeneas Williams, and he touches on the current state of the Los Angeles Rams and Arizona Cardinals and who he thinks is the toughest receiver to guard in the NFL right now.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
